name: Maika Garbes
greetingText: Thank you po sa araw araw!
wishText: May the 2024 will be yours and to your success po Ma'am.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Ma'am Maika!! Yeee!!!
text2: Dapat ganyan lang po talaga Ma'am
text4: so try natin lagyan pa ng mahiwagang
text5Content: Sobrang Special mo po samin ma'am
outroText: Enjoy the day po and Happy Birthday!
replayText: Just click, if you want to watch it again.
